long_description: Injinji Ex-Celerator 2.0 compression socks combines a 5-toe fit with graduated lower leg compression-graduated compression enhances circulation, accelerates muscle recovery and reduces soreness. Graduated compression increases from the ankles through the welt bands; this accelerates blood flow which improves circulation. Anatomic 5-toe design properly aligns toes, prevents blisters and promotes proper posture and balance. Padded terry heels better support downhill running and provide comfort during recovery. Mesh tops provide maximum ventilation and breathability. Stretchy fabric blend with CoolMax(R) fibers maximizes breathability. Injinji Ex-Celerator 2.0 compression socks are constructed to support the arches and are reinforced in the heels and toes. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Injinji Ex-Celerator 2.0 compression socks combines a 5-toe fit with graduated lower leg compression-graduated compression enhances circulation, accelerates muscle recovery and reduces soreness.
